content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5) and multiple boilers and offshore pumps connected through pipe groups.

### Boiler system at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of two boilers (position x=1.5, y=1.0 and position x=1.5, y=3.0) connected through pipes.

### Offshore pump system at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of multiple offshore pumps (positions x=-7.5, y=25.5, x=-18.5, y=27.5, x=-16.5, y=26.5, x=-13.5, y=26.5, x=-3.5, y=27.5, x=-1.5, y=28.5, x=0.5, y=30.5, x=1.5, y=32.5) connected through pipe groups.

### Pipe group system at position(x=-5.5, y=-8.5)
Consists of multiple pipe groups (fluid systems 593943, 593966, 594048, 594050, 594052) connecting various entities.

### Electricity distribution system at position(x=-6.535714285714286, y=9.285714285714286)
Consists of an electricity group with multiple small electric poles.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to fuel a boiler
- Ensure there is coal in the inventory before trying to fuel a boiler.
- Check the boiler's fuel status before attempting to insert coal.

### Errors when trying to insert items into an entity
- Make sure the entity has enough space to hold the items being inserted.
- Check the entity's inventory before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are compatible and can be connected.
- Check the entity's connection points before attempting to connect.

### Errors when working with fluids
- Ensure that the fluid system is properly connected and functioning.
- Check the fluid box and fluid systems before attempting to work with fluids.

### Errors when working with electricity
- Ensure that the electricity group is properly connected and functioning.
- Check the voltage and poles before attempting to work with electricity.
